name: Training aim
description:
Training aim - This is a game for improving your skills of owning a mouse. Accuracy is one of the main indicators in 3D shooters.


Features:
• Nice graphics and music
• There are 9 unique simulators of your reaction, speed and accuracy


How to play:
Moving the mouse and pressing the "esc"


"Training aim" powered by Clickteam Fusion 2.5
Music: Bensound
